title: Plantain Drop Biscuits
directions: Peel and roughly cut plantains and place in food processor.
Add remainder of ingredients except coconut flour and puree until smooth.
Then add coconut flour and continue processing until you have a smooth and slightly thick batter.
Use large spoon to scoop batter a drop it onto a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Bake for 22 - 25 minutes until golden brown and fully cooked.
ingredients: 3 ripe plantains (not green but not too brown)
